data.name: Beyond Sunset Demo
data.detailed_description: SUNSET CITY, CALIFORNIA - 20XX AD: You've been awakened from cryostasis by a mysterious woman.  You can't remember who you are. Your name, your identity... lost in the fog of hypersleep.
data.about_the_game: SUNSET CITY, CALIFORNIA - 20XX AD: You've been awakened from cryostasis by a mysterious woman.  You can't remember who you are. Your name, your identity... lost in the fog of hypersleep.
